full_summary:
# Royal Blue Interlock Fabric Tender

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-PR-759-81430
* **Solicitation Number:** 21C31-221115/A
* **Publication Date:** October 20, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Amendment Date:** January 6, 2023

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Information:** Lafleur, Mario, (873) 354-0072, mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Delivery Location:** CORCAN, Drummondville, Quebec

## Scope of Work

The requirement is for the establishment of a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of royal blue Interlock fabric and collars for CORCAN-Correctional Service of Canada. The fabric and collars must meet the technical requirements defined in Annexes A and B.

## Items Required

* **Item 1:** Double knit tubular Interlock (32in) in royal blue color, with an estimated usage of 135,000 meters over 3 years.
* **Item 2:** Collars (15in) in royal blue color, with detached folding, with an estimated usage of 75,000 units over 3 years.
* **Item 3:** Collars (17in) in royal blue color, with detached folding, with an estimated usage of 45,000 units over 3 years.
* **Item 4:** Tubular rib knit 1 X 1 (27in) in royal blue color, with an estimated usage of 15,000 meters over 3 years.

## Tendering Procedures

* The trade agreement is the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* If 2+ bids offer Canadian goods/services, other bids will not be considered.
* The procurement strategy is competitive, with the lowest/lower bid selected.
* Comprehensive land claim agreement: No.

## Instructions to Bidders

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Standing Offer Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) closing date.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. [TOC - end]
